content: https://youtube.com/shorts/4QbA4OrQtds?feature=shareIts this new idea combining reflection tokenomics and Defi, to create something passively deflationary, I invested in 3 projects that do this innovative iteration on reflections tokenomics and I find them all fascinating.I'm most excited about the fatcat because it blends meme-coin funniness with a smart tokenomics plan, also it was one of the first if not the first.
